page.title: 12EAST LEAKE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The leisure centre forms part of the Harry Carlton Comprehensive School and is used jointly by school and public. The Nottinghamsire Authority pioneered the building of leisure centres at schools to be used by children and adults. The centre has a large hall,used for badminton,indoor football etc.,good changing rooms with showers and a licenced bar. It is one of the smaller centres in the county and unfortunately there is no swimming pool. During school term-time the centre is used exclusively by the school for Physical Education lessons until 4.30 p.m. The large hall is often used for dancing and concerts.
